title: The Tim Simmons Interview: Black Ink Compton, Being Teammates w/ KeeKee & More…
description:
Welcome back to another episode of No Jumper Sports with Keekee, Josh, and Jason. Today the guys are joined by Keekee's former teammate and star of the show "Black Ink Compton" Tim Simmons

Follow Tim
https://www.instagram.com/iamtbs/
